movies.title: Les spécialistes
movies.plot: During a routine transfer of prisoners from one jail to another, an accused cop killer, Paul Brandon, is temporarily chained to a con with only a year left to serve, Stéphane Carella. Paul bolts pulling the reluctant Stéphane with him. They escape to a farmhouse whose lovely owner Laura lost her husband to a cop's bullet; so she agrees to assist them. Once out of their chains, Paul proposes the burglary of a casino owned by the Mafia. Stéphane and Laura agree, but Stéphane soon learns that Paul is an undercover cop whose burglary plot is a ruse to start a war between rival gangs. Can they avoid detection? And what about the heist?
movies.simplePlot: During a routine transfer of prisoners from one jail to another, an accused cop killer, Paul Brandon, is temporarily chained to a con with only a year left to serve, Stéphane Carella. Paul ...

biography.bio: Bernard Giraudeau was born on June 18, 1947 in La Rochelle, Charente-Maritime, France. He was an actor and director, known for Gouttes d'eau sur pierres brûlantes (2000), Ridicule (1996) and A Matter of Taste (2000). He was married to Anny Duperey. He died on July 17, 2010 in Paris, France.
biography.name: Bernard Giraudeau

biography.bio: Gérard Lanvin was born on June 21, 1950 in Boulogne-Billancourt, Hauts-de-Seine, France as Gérard Raymond Lanvain. He is an actor and writer, known for Mesrine Part 2: Public Enemy #1 (2008), Les Lyonnais (2011) and Point Blank (2010). He has been married to Jennifer since May 19, 1984. They have two children.
biography.name: Gérard Lanvin

biography.bio: Christiane Jean was born on May 18, 1959 in Algiers, Alger, France. She is an actress, known for Les nouvelles filles d'à côté (1995), Les filles d'à côté (1993) and Les misérables (1982).
biography.name: Christiane Jean

biography.bio: Maurice Barrier was born on June 8, 1934 in La Flèche, Sarthe, France. He is an actor, known for The Return of Martin Guerre (1982), La vie et rien d'autre (1989) and The Fugitives (1986).
biography.name: Maurice Barrier

biography.bio: Daniel Jégou is an actor, known for Les spécialistes (1985), Les amis de monsieur Gazon (1984) and Silhouettes (1987).
biography.name: Daniel Jégou

biography.bio: Bertie Cortez is an actor, known for The Girl on the Bridge (1999), Astérix chez les Bretons (1986) and Les spécialistes (1985).
biography.name: Bertie Cortez

biography.bio: Christian Bianchi is an actor, known for Les spécialistes (1985), The ComDads (1983) and Happy Easter (1984).
biography.name: Christian Bianchi

biography.bio: Jean-Luc Debrie is an actor, known for Les spécialistes (1985).
biography.name: Jean-Luc Debrie

biography.bio: William Doherty is an actor, known for Marie Antoinette (2006), Éloge de l'amour (2001) and Hanuman (1998).
biography.name: William Doherty

biography.bio: Bernard Hervé is an actor, known for Les spécialistes (1985), The Saint: The Big Bang (1989) and Léon Blum à l'échelle humaine (1986).
biography.name: Bernard Hervé

biography.bio: Salvatore Ingoglia is an actor, known for Femme fatale (2002), Jardin secret (2005) and Les spécialistes (1985).
biography.name: Salvatore Ingoglia

biography.bio: Philippe Lehembre is an actor, known for Asterix and Obelix vs. Caesar (1999), A Self-Made Hero (1996) and Les amants réguliers (2005).
biography.name: Philippe Lehembre

biography.bio: Patrick Massieu is an actor, known for Asterix and Obelix vs. Caesar (1999), 'Round Midnight (1986) and La vie et rien d'autre (1989).
biography.name: Patrick Massieu

biography.bio: Jacques Nolot was born on 31 August 1943 in Marcillac, France and is a well known stage and character actor whose first feature film L'arrière pays (1998) won the First Film Special Distinction Award at the Montreal World Film Festival and a FIPRESCI Special Mention Award at the Venice Film Festival both in 1998. It earned a nomination for Best New Director of a Feature Film at the César Awards in 1999. His next movie L'aigle à deux têtes (1948) also was critically acclaimed. He previously shot the short film Manège (1986) and also wrote several screenplays including J'embrasse pas (1991) and La matiouette ou l'arrière-pays (1983), both directed by André Téchiné and Le café des Jules (1989), directed by Paul Vecchiali. Nolot first appeared in Hôtel des Amériques (1981) and performed in many other films including Viva la vie (1984), Scene of the Crime (1986), Les innocents (1987) or Nenette and Boni (1996).
biography.name: Jacques Nolot

biography.bio: Gerard Parachou is an actor, known for Les spécialistes (1985) and Dernier été à Tanger (1987).
biography.name: Gerard Parachou
